data.title: Hancock County Schools - Georgia
data.meta_description: Explore test scores, parent ratings, state rankings, and statistics for Hancock County Schools in GA.
data.text: Hancock County School is full of people who are willing to help you.The administration at the school make sure that the students have what is needed for them to have for each of their classes. They offer different sports for those who are interested in playing sports. The teachers will go out of their way to make sure that they are explaining the information to the best of their ability. They will push you to do your best and will not take No excuse. The administration will help you find resources that you may need to help you with whatever is going on. They offer different clubs and they have a JROTC program for those who are wanting to enter into the Military. Hancock Central offer the students a chance to do early college by either going to Georgia Military College or Oconee Fall Line Technical College.The Counselor make sure we get ready for SAT and ACT. The Overall, they work with the students to make sure they are ready for the real world and they continue to strive for success.
